title: Customer Relationship Manager (On-Role Caller)
tagsAndSkills: Customer relationship management,Sales,Customer Relationship Manager,Relationship Management,Customer service,CRM,Management,Relationship
jobDescription:
The Customer Relationship Manager (On-Role Caller) will be responsible for managing customer interactions primarily through phone calls. This role involves addressing customer needs, resolving issues, and strengthening relationships to enhance overall customer satisfaction and loyalty.

Key Responsibilities:

Customer Engagement:

Initiate and manage outbound calls to existing and potential customers to build and maintain relationships.
Proactively reach out to customers to provide updates, offer support, and gather feedback.
Conduct regular follow-up calls to ensure customer satisfaction and address any concerns.

Issue Resolution:

Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and issues promptly and professionally.
Resolve customer problems by identifying root causes, providing solutions, and ensuring follow-up.
Escalate complex issues to appropriate departments as needed.

Relationship Management:
Develop a deep understanding of customers' needs and preferences to personalize interactions and enhance satisfaction.
Implement strategies to increase customer retention and loyalty.
Track and analyze customer interactions and feedback to identify trends and areas for improvement.


Sales and Upselling:
Identify opportunities for upselling or cross-selling products and services during customer interactions.
Promote special offers, new products, or services to enhance customer engagement and drive sales.


Administrative Tasks:
Maintain accurate records of customer interactions, transactions, and feedback in CRM systems.
Prepare and deliver reports on customer interactions, satisfaction levels, and performance metrics.


Age criteria : 18-32 years max

title: Mobile Application Architect - Ios
jobDescription:
We are hiring a Lead iOS Engineer for a prestigious US healthcare unicorn client of ours. This role will initially be based in Hyderabad and may require travel to Berlin (Germany) and United States as per the client requirement for a short duration of time. You will be a key-player responsible for leading and building a large product development team of upto 30 mobile application developers.

Technical Specifications
  • Overall experience of 5+ years in native iOS Application development using Objective-C, Swift, iOS SDK and Xcode.
  • Design and implement product requirements using Objective C, Swift.
  • Write high performance Objective C, Swift code, emphasizing efficiency and low-memory consumption.
  • Interface with 3rd party APIs for complex features, analytics tracking, and ad targeting.
  • Experience and proficiency when interacting with RESTful web services.
  • Followed Agile Methodology SCRUM in project development.
  • Worked with Sub-Version Control SVN, BitBucket and Git to check-in/out the codebase changes.
  • Designed applications for all types of screen sizes, orientations and Implemented app designs based on MVC, MVVM architecture.
  • Plan functional solutions to complex problems.
  • Help identify and define services for use within the native application.
  • Automated and manual testing of deliverable.
Qualifications
  • Bachelorâ€™s degree (or higher) in Computer Science or related field from Top ranked Institutions like IIT, NIT, IIIT etc or any other top reputed institutions.
  • Strong proficiency in native app development.
  • Expert knowledge of Interface Builder, XCode and accompanying toolsets.
  • Experience working in an agile environment.
  • Understanding of OO and functional design principles and SDLC.
  • Familiarity with basic operations in Linux.
  • Broad understanding of mobile development and industry best practice.
Technologies required
  • Strong in iOS application development.
  • Objective C, Swift.
  • Data Structures.
  • Strong in Coding skills (Mandatory).
